solution: Dividing both sides by 3, we quickly note that $ 9 = 9^{x-1} \rightarrow 1 = x-1 \rightarrow x = \boxed{2}$.
chatgpt_solution: Since $9=3^2$, $9^x=(3^2)^x=3^{2x}$. Our equation is now $27=3\cdot 3^{2x-2}$, so we can write $$27 = 3\cdot 3^{2x-2} = 3^{1+2x-2} = 3^{2x-1}.$$Thus we must have $2x-1=3$, or $2x=4$, or $x=\boxed{2}$.
